snippet: What led thousands of people around the country to participate in marches over the weekend?
abstract: What led thousands of people around the country to participate in marches over the weekend?
lead_paragraph: In “Thousands March in Washington to Protest Police Violence,” Jennifer Steinhauer and Elena Schneider write about events designed to raise awareness of the use of force by police officers.

headline.main: 6 Q’s About the News | Marching to Protest Police Violence
